headline: How Entergy’s Southeast Texas Gas Buildout Plan Will Impact Entergy (ETR) Investors
summary: Recently, Entergy announced it is seeking proposals for new gas-fired power generation in southeast Texas to support about 1 GW of additional demand, aiming to bring combined-cycle capacity online by 2032 or earlier in line with its Southeast Texas Energy Plan. This move highlights how Entergy is planning around an expected 40% rise in regional energy demand over four years, signaling a significant build-out of infrastructure to maintain reliable service for growing industrial and...

headline: AES vs. Entergy: Which Utility Stock Offers Better Growth?
summary: AES and ETR ramp up renewable investments and AI-driven grid upgrades as data center demand accelerates clean power growth.
